test_cases.name: negative scenario - bulk transfer inactive participants

meta.info: nehative scenario - bulk transfer inactive participant

assertions.description: Response status code 200
Status code is 202
payerfsp callback - date header should be set
payerfsp callback - fspiop-source should be payeefsp
payerfsp callback - fspiop-destination should be testingtoolkitdfsp
payerfsp callback - fspiop-http-method should be PUT
payerfsp callback - fspiop-uri should be /payerfsp/bulkTransfers/
payerfsp callback - Bulk Transfer state should be COMPLETED on Payer side
payerfsp callback - Completed timestamp should be set
payerfsp callback - All individual transfer results (failed & successful) should be returned
payerfsp callback - 1st individual transfer should have fulfilment
payerfsp callback - 2nd individual transfer should have fulfilment
payeefsp callback - date header should be set
payeefsp callback - fspiop-source should be switch
payeefsp callback - fspiop-destination should be payeefsp
payeefsp callback - fspiop-http-method should be PUT
payeefsp callback - fspiop-uri should be as expected
payeefsp callback - Bulk Transfer state should be COMPLETED on Payee side
payeefsp callback - Completed timestamp should be set
payeefsp callback - All individual transfer results (fulfilments) should be returned
payeefsp callback - 1st individual transfer should have fulfilment
payeefsp callback - 2nd individual transfer should have fulfilment
payeefsp request - date header should be set
payeefsp request - fspiop-source should be testingtoolkitdfsp
payeefsp request - fspiop-destination should be payeefsp
payeefsp request - fspiop-http-method should be POST
payeefsp request - fspiop-uri should be as expected
payeefsp request - Bulk transfer Id should be set
payeefsp request - Bulk quote Id should be set
payeefsp request - PayerFsp should be testingtoolkitdfsp
payeefsp request - PayeeFsp should be payeefsp
payeefsp request - expiration should be set
payeefsp request - All individual transfers (prepare) should be sent
payeefsp request - 1st individual transfer should have valid ilpPacket
payeefsp request - 1st individual transfer should have valid condition
payeefsp request - 1st individual transfer should have valid transferAmount
payeefsp request - 1st individual transfer should have valid extensionList
payeefsp request - 2nd individual transfer should have valid ilpPacket
payeefsp request - 2nd individual transfer should have valid condition
payeefsp request - 2nd individual transfer should have valid transferAmount
Response status code 200

test_cases.name: negative scenario - bulk transfer inactive participants account

meta.info: nehative scenario - bulk transfer inactive participant account

assertions.description: Resposne code is 200
Status code is 202
payerfsp callback - date header should be set
payerfsp callback - fspiop-source should be payeefsp
payerfsp callback - fspiop-destination should be testingtoolkitdfsp
payerfsp callback - fspiop-http-method should be PUT
payerfsp callback - fspiop-uri should be /payerfsp/bulkTransfers/
payerfsp callback - Bulk Transfer state should be COMPLETED on Payer side
payerfsp callback - Completed timestamp should be set
payerfsp callback - All individual transfer results (failed & successful) should be returned
payerfsp callback - 1st individual transfer should have errorinformation
payerfsp callback - 2nd individual transfer should have fulfilment
payeefsp callback - date header should be set
payeefsp callback - fspiop-source should be switch
payeefsp callback - fspiop-destination should be payeefsp
payeefsp callback - fspiop-http-method should be PUT
payeefsp callback - fspiop-uri should be as expected
payeefsp callback - Completed timestamp should be set
payeefsp callback - 2nd individual transfer should have fulfilment
payeefsp request - date header should be set
payeefsp request - fspiop-source should be testingtoolkitdfsp
payeefsp request - fspiop-destination should be payeefsp
payeefsp request - fspiop-http-method should be POST
payeefsp request - fspiop-uri should be as expected
payeefsp request - Bulk transfer Id should be set
payeefsp request - Bulk quote Id should be set
payeefsp request - PayerFsp should be testingtoolkitdfsp
payeefsp request - PayeeFsp should be payeefsp
payeefsp request - expiration should be set
payeefsp request - 2nd individual transfer should have valid transferAmount
payerfsp callback - 1st individual transfer should have errorcode  3100
payerfsp callback - 1st individual transfer should have errordescription inactive currency
exec: expect(transfer1.errorInformation.errorDescription).to.equal('Generic validation error - Participant payeefsp '+environment.currency+' account is inactive')
